item.description:
Join us on a hike to one of the "bushwhacks" on the New England Hundred Highest list - Peak above the Nubble in Twin Mountain.

The plan is to meet at the Beaver Brook XC ski area parking lot on Rte 3 in Bethlehem at 9 AM sharp and car pool from there to the start of the hike.
Dogs are Welcome!

It's hunting season - wear something orange - MANDATORY

We will hike at book time with short stops (in order to stay warm) for food and water. Plan on food/snacks that you can eat while moving.

Please check your maps, AMC White Mountain Guide, or other online forums for a description of the peak/trails.

Parts of this hike will take us through thick spruce - eye protection, long pants/shirts are recommended.

If you have any questions on equipement or the hike please ask before showing up for the hike.


RSVP Questions are not optional - we will provide attendees with our cell phone number via email in advance of the hike.


As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in a green Suburban with NH plates and ROT & VFTT decals.
item.name: PAtN - Sunday November 14, 2010
